name: Superpack
overview:
We produce and supply with the wide spectrum of protective self adhesive tapes for the use in an office, different areas of industry, advertisment and domestic use.

If you search protective self adhesive tapes for building, production, office or domestic use we are ready to you to give them. The spectrum of products broadens constantly, therefore if you did not find protective self adhesive tape on our pages, will call to us and we will look as we will be able to you to help.

Our company built well-known positive reputation in area of quality of protective self adhesive tapes among the domestic and foreign producers of self adhesive tapes.

The different stickiness of protective tapes provides their different setting from a weak stickiness â€“ used as decorating to the strong stickiness â€“ used in building.

We spare the special attention to our protective tapes, having regard to circumstance that using them, you avouch for end-user high quality of Your products.
